text: Tujhse naraz nahi zindagi, hairan hu mai
author: Gulzar

text: Pal, do pal, ki hi kyun hai zindagi, iss pyar ko hai sadiyaan kaafi nahi
author: Javed Akhtar

text: Kuch khaas hai, kuch paas hai, kuch ajnabi ehsaas hai
author: Vishal Dadlani

text: Kabhi kabhi mere dil mein khayal aata hai
author: Sahir Ludhianvi

text: Tere bina zindagi se koi shikwa to nahi, tere bina zindagi bhi lekin zindagi to nahi
author: Gulzar

text: Jo haal dil ka idhar ho raha hai, woh samaa ka aalam kuchh bhi nahi hai
author: Javed Akhtar

text: Jeene ke ishaare mil gaye, hum to sare kho gaye
author: Amitabh Bhattacharya

text: Aisa koi zindagi mein aaye, jo zindagi ko zindagi banaye
author: Irshad Kamil

text: Tum hi ho, ab tum hi ho, zindagi ab tum hi ho
author: Mithoon

text: Kahin toh hogi woh, duniya jahaan tu mere saath hai
author: Javed Akhtar

text: Abhi mujh mein kahin, baaki thodi si hai zindagi
author: Turaz

text: Lag jaa gale, ki phir ye haseen raat ho na ho
author: Raja Mehdi Ali Khan

text: Tere jaisa yaar kahan, kahan aisa yaaraana, yaad karegi duniya, tera mera afsaana
author: Anand Bakshi

text: Aadha ishq, aadha hai, aadha hojayega
author: Amitabh Bhattacharya

text: Tum se hi din hota hai, surmaiye shaam aati hai
author: Irshad Kamil

text: Kal ho na ho, har ghadi badal rahi hai roop zindagi
author: Javed Akhtar

text: Jiski aankhon mein meri hi nami ho, ussi chandni raat mein, chand bhi chhup jaye
author: Gulzar

text: Tujh mein rab dikhta hai, yaara mein kya karu
author: Jaideep Sahni

text: Channa mereya mereya, channa mereya mereya, beliya
author: Amitabh Bhattacharya

text: Tere bina jeena saza ho gaya, rooh meri tadap ke na jaane kya kar gaya
author: Kunaal Vermaa

text: Ek ladki ko dekha toh aisa laga, jaise khilta gulab, jaise shaayar ka khwaab
author: Javed Akhtar

text: Pee loon tere neelay neelay nainon se shabnam
author: Irshad Kamil

text: Ami je ke tomar, ke je amar
author: Gauriprasanna Majumdar

text: Aaj jaane ki zid na karo
author: Fayyaz Hashmi

text: Jibon mane jontrona, chokher duto jole
author: Gazi Mazharul Anwar

text: Jodi tor daak shune keu na ashe, tobe ekla cholo re
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: Dure kothao, dure kothao, jao na
author: Hasan Motiur Rahman

text: Ekbar bol nei tor keu nei
author: Ayub Bachchu

text: Ei poth jodi na shesh hoi, shei poth chola, ekhon ar shesh hoi
author: Kabir Suman

text: Tomake chai, amar moto thakte dao
author: Anupam Roy

text: Cholo bodle jai, amay keno tore?
author: Hasan Motiur Rahman

text: Bristi jhore jhore, shokale uthe mon
author: Gazi Mazharul Anwar

text: Tumi amar moner majhi, amar poran jaha chai
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: Din bodoler khide, tomar kajol kajol kore
author: Kabir Suman

text: O amar dorodi age janle tor vitor
author: Hasan Motiur Rahman

text: Kothao amar hariye jaoar nei mana
author: Gauriprasanna Majumdar

text: Cholo hariye jai, bhalobasha hariye jai
author: Kabir Suman

text: Akash prodip jole, shukno latar ful
author: Rabindranath Tagore

text: You are the sunshine of my life
author: Stevie Wonder

text: I don't want to miss a thing
author: Aerosmith
